body.name: Logitech C925-E Webcam, HD 1080p/30fps Video Calling, Light Correction, Autofocus, Clear Audio, Privacy Shade, Works with Skype Business, WebEx, Lync, Cisco, PC/Mac/Laptop/Macbook - Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 44 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Provides HD 1080p/30 fps and HD autofocus for true-to-life clarity in a fixed 78° field of view. Plus, RightLight 2 technology works in the background to adjust visual quality.
Features dual integrated omnidirectional mics optimized to clearly capture audio up to one meter away so conversations always sound natural and clear.
Supports H.264 with Scalable Video Coding (SVC) and UVC 1.1 encoding to minimize dependence on computer and network resources to produce remarkably clear video at all times.
The Logi Tune Desktop app simplifies personal device control with zoom in/out, color presets, color adjustments, set manual focus, and easy firmware updates.
Certified for Microsoft Teams and Skype for Business. Certifications and compatibility with other popular applications include Google Meet and Zoom.
Securely mount C925e wherever it works best—laptop, display or tabletop—with the adjustable clip or affix to your own tripod with the integrated thread.
Open or close the built-in lens shade with the slider tab on top of C925e. The lens appears white when the slider is closed, assuring privacy and peace of mind.
body.description: The Logitech C925e Webcam delivers high quality HD video for an enhanced face-to-face collaboration experience from virtually any desktop. With a 78° field of view, autofocus and built-in stereo microphones, C925e brings crystal-clear video conversations to open workspaces, home offices and private offices. USB plug-and-play connectivity makes the C925e Webcam easy to use, plus it works with any video conferencing software application—including the ones you already use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The privacy shutter and the green indicator light are the two best features. Picture quality is excellent. The 1st unit worked seemlessly with my Teams from work, then bought a 2nd unit for personal use. Pleasantly found out that when my employer altered some office space to hoteling spaces, the camera used appears to be this same type if not the exact model. Pleased with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear HD Web Cam with Impressive Audio is Perfect for Business Video Calls
reviews.reviewText: This web cam produces extremely clear audio and video, is perfect for 1-3 people, and is plug-and-play with my MacBook.My workplace recently placed an emphasis on video conference calling given the increasing number of remote employees (of which I am one). The EyeSight camera built into my MacBook is very good, but it's placement on my desk in my home office faces a bank of windows, leading to constant contrast issues. I purchased this webcam and boom it in closer by attaching a 25 inch Flexible Jaw Long Arm Swivel Clamp Clip Mount Holder Stand for Logitech Webcam C925e C922x C922 C930e C930 C920 C615 to the back of my monitor stand and booming the camera about 10" closer to me. I do this because I have a 34" Dell Ultrawide monitor pretty far back on the desk and this camera has a relatively wide field of view, so having the cam be so far away was less than ideal.Video is always bright and vibrant regardless of lighting conditions. My home office can vary in lighting between "bathed in sunlight" and "dimly lit speakeasy", but the "RightLight" tech in the C925 does a great job of making it appear as though a pro lighting rig is in place.Audio from my computer plays through a 5.1 Yamaha home theater system, which I was worried would cause echo or feedback through the camera's stereo microphones, but unless I crank the audio to unnecessary volumes, I never have echo or feedback problems. The off-axis rejection from these mics is impressive, as my dogs have been barking elsewhere in the house and my co-workers were not able to hear them.The built-in on-air light is green and very bright. I also appreciate the built-in lens cover. Call me paranoid (I have a slide-over cover on my MacBook web cam), but I like the ability to physically block the lens.If you can swing it, the Logitech Brio is incredible. I don't think the video quality is necessarily better than this one right now, but it's a degree of future-proofed being 4K and the audio would likely be better with a large group. Otherwise, I recommend this version. It's reliable for clear audio and video

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clarity and actually useful mic
reviews.reviewText: For those looking for a setup for a laptop that is secure I would look else as the system used to stabilize this camera on the back of the monitor isn't the most stable if you are constantly adjusting your laptop or moving it. Now past that I use this for my work desktop and home desktop and constantly bring it home. The picture is great it has no problem focusing. The thing the stood out to me most was the mic on it is quite good as some of my coworkers were still able to hear even from the distance as I went to get a glass of water. While also not so sensitive as to hear air condition turning on or my old refrigerator humming not far away. Overall it works hasnt failed and made my work life alot easier. Also the camera is a little bit wider then some past webcams I have used so I am very happy overall with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great picture quality in simple camera
reviews.reviewText: it works great and easy to set up. Still working on fine tuning the audio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great little camera for the price! Sound and picture are crisp. I use this solely for my zoom meetings for work. Couldn't be happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I've been using my iPad for Zoom meetings. It was clumsy and the picture was small. I asked my IT consultant if I could use my computer instead. He said all I needed was a camera. We are loyal users of Logitech products so it was easy to make a choice. This one arrived in two days and took minutes to set up. I like the slide on top that covers the lens to give me privacy and to keep the lens protected. I've used it several times and it beats my other option. The microphone works perfectly as well. My only regret is that I didn't make the purchase sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Logictech never fails
reviews.reviewText: When my old webcam quit, I bought this one. Modern looking. Easy to place just about anywhere. Truly plug and play. Nice curtain closure. Let’s hope this one lasts as long as my other logictech. (15yrs)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: the customer was happy with the product
Muito bom a webcam, qualidade dentro do esperado, nos testes realizados a imagem saiu muito bom
Excelente cámara, la iluminación y el campo de visión súper bien !
Web facile à installer, bon article

Video-Qualität ist klasse. Überraschenderweise hat mich am ende sogar das eingebaute Mikro am meisten überzeugt. Das erfüllt nämlich im ruhigen Homeoffice seine Funktion ganz ausgezeichnet. Ich brauche hier kein Headset mehr. Das macht Video-Calls viel entspannter. Das ist somit viel mehr einem natürlichen Gespräch nachempfunden.
